document_data.name: Kinondra
document_data.mainbody: '''Kinondra''' was the [[witch doctor]] leader of a [[fire giant]] group that resided in the [[Deepwing Mountains]] of the [[Vilhon Reach]] in the late-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Kinondra was an {{SI|18'|'"|long=yes}} fire giant man.
document_data.Abilities: As a witch doctor, the fire giant had access to both [[arcane]] and [[divine]] magics.
document_data.Possessions: Kinondra protected himself with a ''[[Ring of protection|ring]]'' and a ''[[cloak of protection]]''.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, the city of [[Lachom]] became menaced by a gang of fire giants of the Deepwing Mountains. Kinondra's band raided several farms around the city but refrained from attacking Lachom itself. In response, the city's Mayor [[Turien Battlewake]] put out a call for capable adventurers to resolve the giant threat. Unbeknownst to most, Kinondra was hired by a short-term Lord [[Simon Dessino]] of [[Arrabar]] who was attempting to show Lachom that the city needed [[Chondath]]'s protection.
